possibles: I quote sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation
I misquote sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation
I am tolerant of other faiths and respect the worship of other Gods.
I am intolerant of other faiths and condemn the worship of other Gods.

possibles.3: I idolize a particular hero of my faith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
possibles.4: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working towards peace.
possibles.5: I see omens in every event and action. The God(s) try to speak to us, we just needs to listen.
possibles.6: Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
possibles.7: I've enjoyed find food, drink, and high society among my temple's elite. Rough living grates on me.
possibles.8: I've spent so long in the temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the outside world.

possibles.description: The ancient traditions of sacrificial worship must be upheld.
I always try to help those in need, no matter the personal cost.
I seek tp prove myself worthy of my God's favour by matching my actions against His/Her teachings.
We must help bring about the changes the God(s) are constantly working in the world.
I hope to one day rise to the top of my faith's religious heirarchy and/or receive that level of recognition from my God(s).
I trust that my God(s) will guide my actions. I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well.

possibles.1: I would die to recover an ancient relic of my faith that was lost long ago.
possibles.2: I will someday get revenge on the corrupt temple heirarchy who branded me a heretic.
possibles.3: I owe my life to the priest who took me in when my parents died.
possibles.4: Everything I do is for the common people.
possibles.5: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
possibles.6: I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies consider heretical and seek to destroy.

possibles.1: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
possibles.2: I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple's heirarchy.
possibles.3: My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my God(s).
possibles.4: I am inflexible in my thinking.
possibles.5: I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
possibles.6: Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.
